title: How to Do the Boolprop Cheat on the Sims 2

steps.title: Go to the neighborhood of your choice, press Ctrl + Shift + C in that order.
steps.content: Go to the neighborhood of your choice, press Ctrl + Shift + C in that order. A box will appear at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Type in or paste - boolProp testingCheatsEnabled true.
steps.content: Type in or paste - boolProp testingCheatsEnabled true. Enter it exactly as you see it with the spaces. Cheats are also not case-sensitive, so you can enter it all in lowercase if you wish. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press the enter key.
steps.content: Press the enter key. If you've done it right the cheat box will close by itself, if you've done it wrong the box will become bigger and you will see a lot of things in it. After typing the cheat in again, to get rid of the box type in 'exit' (no quotation marks).

steps.title: Go to create a family or to a family that's already been made.
steps.content: Go to create a family or to a family that's already been made. To create a family you will need to type in the family's name and press Shift + N. This will enable debugging mode. A box will appear telling you that you've unlocked new hairstyles, skin colors, and clothes. This allows you to wear NPC clothes and other things. To disable debugging mode, press Shift + M. If you're in a family already, you can do many things with it : Change a Sim's fitness level. Press Shift, click on a Sim and select the option Change Fitness to change it to the way you want. Kill any Sim. Select the option Kill and choose any option.

steps.title: Change your needs by dragging the bar to where you want it.
steps.content: Change your needs by dragging the bar to where you want it. You can also do this with skills and relationships, as well as hobbies if you have the FreeTime expansion pack.

steps.title: If you have the Boolprop cheat on in Live Mode you can get special hairstyles.
steps.content: If you have the Boolprop cheat on in Live Mode you can get special hairstyles. Different colors like purple, blue and green are some of them. To do that, first do steps one, two and three and then enter the family's household. Click on a mirror, and click 'Change Appearance'. Then click the Custom Content icon next to the hair colour icons. Then there should be new hairstyle icons with new colours. Click on one of those. Click the tick icon at the bottom of the window and you are now wearing the different hairstyle!

steps.title: Let your imagination wander and have fun!
steps.content: Let your imagination wander and have fun!
